import React from 'react'; import Plotly from "plotly.js" import createPlotlyComponent from 'react-plotly.js/factory'; import transferPercentData from '../data/graphic/transfer_percent.json' const Plot = createPlotlyComponent(Plotly); const hole_size = .6; // const pie_subtext_low = 'fdg'; // const pie_subtext_high = 'fdg'; const pie_colors = ['rgb(65,123,236)', 'rgba(140, 148, 158, 0.2)']; const pie_legend = { xanchor: "center", yanchor: "top", y: -0.3, // play with it x: 0.5 // play with it }; const pie_annotations = [ { font: { size: 25, color: "#252F4A", }, showarrow: false, text: '', x: 0.5, y: 0.5 }, { font: { size: 12, color: '', }, showarrow: false, text: '', x: 0.5, y: 0.01 } ]; const pie_markers = { colors: pie_colors }; const pie_title_font = { size: 12, color: '#818E9B' } const imbalance_psk_pu = { layout: { title: 'График небалансов между показаниями ПСК и ПУ, в % от ПУ' }, data: [ { x: [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec" ], y: [ -22258.62, -19341.75, -19674.89, -18135.07, -18576.98, -17191.18, -15894.16, -14348.42, -13830.52, -18908.49, -22282, -18487.81 ], name: '2017', type: 'bar' }, { x: [ "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec" ], y: [ -52525.83, -36566.04, -36578.62, -35485.97, -40367.4, -54592.95, -44747.68, -47542.37, -21399.33, -19676.71, -18399.37, -20579.74, -16905.96, -16494.3, -14170.28, -15121.96, -15534.51, -17244.41, -17986.74, -23654.08 ], name: '2018', type: 'bar' }, { x: [ "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Dec", "Dec", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Dec", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Dec", "Dec", "Dec", "Dec", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec" ], y: [ -13426.44, 142021.84, 174228.97, 185251.28, 410005.32, 407173.31, 68274.6, 8257.4, 46786.05, 316001, 324478.48, 329400.06, 363569.21, -10619.84, 4374.61, 6176.04, 5849.38, -39808.55, 42612.65, 102833.07, -3326.98, 6601.89, -19514.1, -19322.37, -18437.41, -17235.54, -15862.74, -16837.81, -13431.07, -14319.29, -15076.65, -15056.28, -15363.37, -15187.83, -53102.63, 57498.88, 85701.76, 63208.5, 74687.43, 95313.85 ], name: '2019', type: 'bar' }, { x: [ "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Jan", "Feb", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul" ], y: [ 1551018.37, 1406195.67, 1206596.56, 1124306.54, 995445.78, 1001776.25, 376249.93, 342711.1, 344639.07, 290490.58, 276318.4, 228227.62, 234160.33, 113345.9, 99996.16, 94463.92, 71290.6, 65181.62, 37358.3, 37094.93, 11245.7, 10610.9, 11063.1, 10363.2, 5178.9, 258.2, 297, 214.6, 351710.06, 321788.83, 327001.81, 298113.74, 283908.8, 279755.64, 275446.11, 7722.65, 7347.8, 7553.88, 2727.67, 2840.19, 2247.3, 928.06, 68929.3, 64378.5, 59726.7, 47824.4, 44034, 39363.1, 42847.4, 33874, 27121.21, 306606.79, 281683.71, 264369.8, 239898.28, 236166.21, -20062.3, -19724.18, -20870.8, -17640.9, -18425.13, -14217.57, -28309.1, 8810.04, 3331.43, 3994.9, 3046.2, 4439.96, 220063.71, 206266.11, 205792.85, 170217.01, 155447.61, 137833.25, 137469.53, 56197, 50950.7, 52920.1, 50616.8, 46136.5, 42797.7, 42853.3, 33676.4, -48152.97, -40276.14, -40496.75, -45918.29, -39623.1, -37525.6, -36506.72, 110137.36, 78550.64, 86849.44, 38371.24, 50145.68, 9780.27, 40148.28, 143659.68, 124145.44, 136744.65, 126390.24, 117987.9, 103870.98, 99911.33, 11247.1, 10656.08, 12642.87, 3464.08, 4717.78, 4125.24, 1074.06, 17080.1, 16814.13, 18410.89, 13601.14, 11365.52, 14213.02, 12808.35, -15334.06, -12711.22, -17011.69, -16978.63, -14416.92, -13164.52, -11422.42, 98289.64, 94774.47, 105668.63, 88028.83, 93891.84, 65149.96, 72616.67 ], name: '2020', type: 'bar' } ] }; const transfer_percent = { layout: { title: 'Процент передачи показаний приборов технического учета за месяц' }, data: [ { values: [], labels: [ '', 'other' ], type: 'pie', hole: hole_size, textinfo: 'none' } ] }; const difference_percent = { layout: { showlegend: false, hoverinfo: 'none', width: 300, height: 300, title: { text:'Процент несоответствия предиктивного
и фактического небалансов', x: 0.5, xanchor: 'center', y: 0.1, yanchor: 'bottom', font: pie_title_font }, legend: pie_legend, annotations: pie_annotations }, data: [ { values: [], labels: [ '', '' ], type: 'pie', hole: hole_size, textinfo: 'none', hoverinfo: 'none', marker: pie_markers } ], config: { responsive: true } }; const person_trust_index = { layout: { title: 'Индекс доверия показаниям физических лиц в ПСК' }, data: { values: [], labels: [], type: 'pie', hole: hole_size } }; const tech_loss_index = { layout: { title: 'Индекс технических потерь' }, data: { values: [], labels: [], type: 'pie', hole: hole_size } }; const house_trust_index = { layout: { title: 'Индекс доверия показаниям общедомовых нужд в ПСК' }, data: { values: [], labels: [], type: 'pie', hole: hole_size } }; const compnay_trust_index = { layout: { title: 'Индекс доверия показаниям юридических лиц в ПСК' }, data: { values: [], labels: [], type: 'pie', hole: hole_size } }; const month_input = { layout: { title: 'График суммарных помесчных показаний согласно приборам учета, кВтч' }, data: { x: [], y: [], type: 'bar' } }; const month_psk_out = { layout: { title: 'График суммарных помесчных показаний от ПСК, кВтч' }, data: { x: [], y: [], type: 'bar' } }; const balance_group_tech_loss = { layout: { title: 'Технические потери на балансовой группе, кВтч' }, data: { x: [], y: [], type: 'bar' } }; const meter_avg = { layout: { title: 'Передача показаний приборов технического учета, %' }, data: { x: [], y: [], type: 'bar' } }; function createDataArrayPie(rowData, balance_index, chart_data, key) { chart_data.data[0].values = []; var genuion_value = rowData.find(element => element.balance_index == balance_index)[key]; var rest_value = 100 - genuion_value; chart_data.data[0].values.push(genuion_value, rest_value); chart_data.layout.annotations[0].text = genuion_value.toString() + '%'; chart_data.layout.annotations[1].text = 'Низкий'; chart_data.layout.annotations[1].font.color = '#21BA49'; if(genuion_value > 50){ chart_data.layout.annotations[1].text = 'Высокий'; chart_data.layout.annotations[1].font.color = '#D33126'; } } export class GraphicGroup extends React.Component { render() { const filterText = this.props.filterText; createDataArrayPie(transferPercentData, filterText, difference_percent, 'difference_unbalance'); console.log(difference_percent.data); return (
); } }
